text: This is a list of Italian television related events from 2003. ==Events== *8 May - Floriana Secondi wins season 3 of Grande Fratello. ==Debuts== ===International=== *19 March - Scrubs (MTV) (2001–2010) *October - // The Adventures of Paddington Bear (Italia 1) (1997–2000) ==Television shows== ===2000s=== *Grande Fratello (2000–present) ==Ending this year== ==Births== ==Deaths== ==See also== *2003 in Italy *List of Italian films of 2003
title: 2003 in Italian television
